author: geirm
msg: Motivated by a bug report from Jason, fixed class of bugs where parser REF or REFMOD state not correctly terminated.  Would cause parser exceptions depending upon following stream.

author: werken
msg: Updated werken.xpath.jar to fix problems with punctuation within string literals.

author: geirm
msg: Added tests for the single-quoted, non-interpolated string lits.

author: geirm
msg: Reworked for neatness, efficiency, and support for single-quoted string literals :
This won't be interpolated, regardless of the interpolation setting.
